nodes.text: Storms is the tenth story arc in the Star Wars: Legacy comic series.

Cade Skywalker finds himself in trouble on the planet Kiffex. He nearly kills his cousin, a Guardian, but his friend Jariah Syn intervenes. He hides with his uncle who reveals Azlyn Rae is still alive, but encased in a suit. She angrily tells Cade she wanted to die, and his relatives give him until his ship, the Mynock is repaired to leave.
